title: Welcome to NOVA Now
description: Now is the time to go beyond the headlines and understand the science behind the most pressing questions of our time. From the PBS science series NOVA, a biweekly podcast separating fact from fiction—it’s NOVA Now, hosted by Alok Patel. Visit our website at: http://www.pbs.org/novanowpodcast
itunes:title: Welcome to NOVA Now
itunes:subtitle: The science behind the news.
author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (NOVA NOW)
itunes:author: NOVA NOW
